comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Bain's companion photo is dated 8/29/14: perhaps the Harrimans were gathered in NYC for the Woman's Peace Parade, held that day.

Another Bain photo shows Daisy Harriman (Mrs. Borden Harriman) on August 20, 1912, tossing Woodrow Wilson campaign buttons into the crowd during a rally in New York City's Union Square:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2368281179/]
